short_summary: HEATING, REFRIGERATION & AIR-CONDITIONING MAINTENANCE, REPAIR & CLEANING
description: VIA Rail Canada Inc. requires a supplier to provide HVAC and Refrigeration Repair Services at Winnipeg Maintenance Centre. The scope of work and technical requirements are presented under Part B -  Appendix A - Scope of Work and Specifications  of the ITT. Bidding and Documents are available on http:\/\/www.merx.com. Fees may apply; See https:\/\/www.merx.com\/public\/pricing for more information.
